CustomField.description: Used in third party pledge payments. This controls whether the third party organization's DCO get soft credited. If True, the DCO will get soft credit and if False, the DCO will not get soft credit.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used in third party pledge payments. This controls whether the third party organization's DCO get soft credited. If True, the DCO will get soft credit and if False, the DCO will not get soft credit.
CustomField.label: Third Party - Enable Third Party DCO
